dk.dtu.sb.spn
Class Reaction

java.lang.Object
  dk.dtu.sb.spn.Reaction

public class Reaction
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a transition in the StochasticPetriNet.

addReactant

public void addReactant(java.lang.String speciesId)
Add reactant to this reaction with multiplicity 1.

Parameters:
speciesId - An identifier for an instance of the Species-class found in the associated StochasticPetriNet.

addReactant

public void addReactant(java.lang.String speciesId,
                        int multiplicity)
Add reactant to this reaction.

Parameters:
speciesId - An identifier for an instance of the Species-class found in the associated StochasticPetriNet.
multiplicity - The amount subtracted from this reactant when this reaction is fired.
